text: yeah so the HBS candidates that we've
gotten have been some of our most
successful and by by that I mean they've
been promoted very quickly we think of
the candidates that we get from HBS as
high potential candidates so we see them
as having really great long-term
potential to help build our small
company and so it's been really valuable
when we can get someone from HBS they
they make quite an impact on a small
organization and typically do very well
and kind of get promoted very quickly
and the students who come from HBS do
very well into integrating into the
organization and being able to um really
hit the ground running on their projects
but also be involved uh with a lot of
our office activities that we do as well
and I think there's a great balance that
they're able to strike um given their
background's um previous work experience
as well as their experience here while
they're at HBS
